named-query.name: Book.findAllXML
named-query.query: Select b from Book b Order By b.rating Desc

named-query.name: Book.findByMinRatingXML
named-query.query: Select b from Book b where b.rating >= ?1 Order By b.rating

named-native-query.name: Book.findByAuthorNativeXML
named-native-query.query: Select * from book b where b.author = :author
